p: A Community of Practice Opt-In Directory was offered to all participants in week 3 of the CCHH ECHO. Participants were given the opportunity to stay connected with fellow participants after the CCHH ECHO session by filling out a confidential survey listing their name, email address, and optional cellular telephone number. During the last week of the CCHH ECHO, 55 participants (8% of 625 unique participants) who signed up for this directory were sent information to their ECHO classmates as a method to connect with one another after the course.
